Name: AcidPunk : Echoes of Doll City
About the game: ACIDPUNK will immerse you deep into the dystopian metropolis of Doll City . Embark on a VR journey to a dark and psychedelic cyberpunk universe. Experience vibrant and trippy visuals while listening to a carefuly crafted soundtrack taking its inspiration from synthwave and psychedelic rock classics. You will be accompanied in your quest for truth by a mysterious entity, who will guide you in this strange place, from creepy dark alleys to imposing and beautiful landscapes. Welcome to the razor's edge, in the madness of a waking nightmare, where drugs slowly grind away the last hopes of the city and its inhabitants.
